Text: Huh?
SO DAMN BORIIIIIIIIIIING!!!
What was that?! WHAT'S WRONG WITH THAT GIRL!? I went out of my way to prepare a situation that she would love, and she's all like, "It's about time we call it a day~"?! Chicken much!?
What's more, she could tell without issue that was a dream; the memory alteration didn’t even budge her one bit. Her resistance is way too high! Is she bugged!?
Relax
RELAX!? HOW AM I SUPPOSED TO RELAX!? I’ve got my pride too, y’know! I haven’t had any fun yet! There’s no way I’m letting it end like this! I’m gonna give her a dream she’ll NEVER forget!!
UWAAAAaaaahhhh...!?
Eh!? T-This dream again? I thought it was over...
...Wha... What's this? My head's spinning...
And that's not all... I-I feel like I'm being pulled innnnnn—!
Wakana-chan...
Ah... Se.. Sen-pai...?
...Where are we...? It's dark... And... this warm sensation is...
──Eh!? W-WHAAAAAAAA-...!!?
W-Why!? Isn't this... a locker!? And I'm inside with senpai...
T-This situation... is impossible! Which means...
A dream! This is a dream, isn't it!?
I-I'm so sorry, Senpai... Even if it was an accident... Someone like me, getting this close to you...
Let's get out of here
...R-Right. Though... part of me doesn’t really want to...
W-What's this...? The door... won't open...?
It's not stuck either... it simply won't budge...!
Then, we'll just have to wait for help to come...
N-No way! This is bad...!
Help... I mean, it's after school, which means no one is here! What's more, if someone saw us in such a place together...
Whatever... it doesn’t matter. None of that does. What matters right now...
...Is that I’m alone here with you, Senpai.
I don't care if it's just a dream. I’d never have the guts to do something like this... in the "real world"...
...But. Someday... if I could muster even the slightest bit of courage...
....Pshyuuun....
AAAAAAAAAAHHHHHHHH♪
This!! THIS is what I was after☆ That was exactly the kind of thing I wanted to seeee~ I really outdid myself, good job~♪
Weeeell... maybe I went just sliiiightly overboard with the hypnosis. She was kind of overflowing near the end...
Anyway, you handle the cleanup, kay~♪ I'll watch the records of that log just to have another laugh~
Ugh! M-My head...!
...Eh? Kishi-san!? Why are you at my place...?
...O-Oh, right... I asked him to come. I wanted to treat him to dinner.
...Oh, th-that's right! The Bandishark's door is...
"Too bad for youuu~♡ Still locked tighhhht~♡"
Oh, come on... Fubuki-chan, really...?
Which means, I... fell asleep in front of Kishi-san? J-Just how careless can I...
There's no graffiti in my face... Of course, he's not Fubuki-chan. Instead, he put a blanket on me...
...I'm sorry, Kishi-san. I fell asleep midway through offering you dinner...
After all, I have to keep an eye on you
...Y-Yes. You watched... my sleeping face... Ehehe...
If I had been locked up alone... I would have been lonely. Having you here watching over me... it's a great help...♪
Well then, I'm glad
Ehehe...
...I-I said it. Even if we're not glued to each other like in that dream... I've mustered up just a little bit of courage...
To Fubuki-chan who created this situation... and to whoever created that dream... I'm a little bit grateful, maybe...?
